subject: Missing baseplate Order #SSN4225
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I just opened my package today

and I am missing my base plate.

Can you send it out to me please? Thank you!


*Best regards,*
Eric W. Lam
626.297.8836

*University of California, Los Angeles (2020) - Biology, B.S.*

conversations.body_text:
Simsonn support team,

Can I get a follow-up on this? I've submitted a PayPal dispute just now. I
just want my base plate that I paid for. Thank you.

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 6:45 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Eric Lam,    Here's another tracking link for your shipment. Don't worry.  ​http://fedex.com/fedextrack/system-error?trknbr=396275661810

Thank you!


*Best regards,*
